item.description:
Come and help brainstorm how best to help
elect Ron Paul.

Meeting is from 6:30-8:30 pm. Library closes
at 9 pm

The area is upstairs on the second floor.

NOTE: PLEASE leave your Ron Paul signs, literature at home or in your car. We do not want to have any issues arise with having blatant political material in the library.

Agenda is:

1. Intro (for those that have not met everyone) (5 minutes)
2. Discuss "go-to" people (30 minutes)
3. NH planning (How can we help NH and the upcoming primary) (30 minutes)
4. MA primary/delegates planning (30 minutes)
5. Any other comments, questions, ideas not relating to the above. (10 minutes)

Please see the agenda I uploaded for further detail

Map of Somerville Public Library West Branch

The library is a short distance from the Davis Red Line stop (take the Alewife train). Head up College Ave a couple blocks and the library will be on your left.

Please check the map for further details.

If you have any questions please contact me: Andrew Johnson at siraud002@yahoo.com
item.name: Planning and Brainstorming for Ron Paul (Part Deux)
